text: Mariona Rebull is a 1943 novel by the Spanish writer Ignasi Agustí. It is a historical romance, set amongst the high society of nineteenth century Barcelona. A young, neglected wife begins a passionate affair which ultimately ends in tragedy. In 1947 the novel was turned into a film of the same title, with Blanca de Silos playing the title role.San Miguel & Hortelano p.20 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Helio San Miguel, Lorenzo J.
